entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
